alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Graves; Hopkins; Lyon; Marshall; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 06 at 3:49AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following areas, Caldwell, Calloway, Christian, Graves, Hopkins, Lyon, Marshall, Muhlenberg, Todd and Trigg. * WHEN...From 6 AM CST this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop today across southern sections of west Kentucky. During the day, these showers and thunderstorms are expected to move repeatedly over the same area, and will be capable of producing one to three inches of rain over a very short period of time. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Graves; Hopkins; Lyon; Marshall; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
